get.summary: Display a listing of the categories.
Display a listing of the stores.

post.summary: Store a newly created product in storage.

put.summary: Update the specified product in storage.

patch.summary: Update the specified product in storage.

delete.summary: Remove the specified product from storage.

patch.summary: Toggle publish state of the specified product.

get.summary: Display a listing of products for a specific category.
Display a listing of products for a specific Store.
Display a listing of the orders.

post.summary: Store a newly created order in storage.

put.summary: Update the specified order in storage.

patch.summary: Update the specified order in storage.

delete.summary: Remove the specified order from storage.

patch.summary: Cancel the specified order from storage.

put.summary: Update the specified order item in storage for a specific order.

patch.summary: Update the specified order item in storage for a specific order.

delete.summary: Remove the specified order item from storage for a specific order.

post.summary: Store a newly created review in storage.
Store a newly created resource in storage.
